requirements.summary: Create customer management interface with list view, add/edit/delete functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Customers are displayed in a table or list format
Each customer row shows name, email, phone, and current balance
Add Customer button opens a form to create new customers
Edit and Delete actions are available for each customer
Customer list updates in real-time after any changes

file_operations.description: Create CustomerList component that fetches and displays all customers using getAllCustomers backend method with React Query. Display customers in a table with columns for name, email, phone, and current balance. Include Add Customer, Edit, and Delete action buttons for each row. Use shadcn/ui Table and Button components for consistent styling.

Create React Query hook that wraps getAllCustomers backend method. Provides queries for fetching customer list and mutations for create, update, and delete operations. Handle loading and error states appropriately.

Create React Query hook that wraps getTransactionsByCustomer backend method. Provides query for fetching customer transactions and mutation for creating new transactions. Calculate and return current balance from transaction history.

requirements.summary: Create ledger transaction interface showing transaction history with running balance
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking on a customer navigates to their transaction view
Transactions are displayed in chronological order
Each transaction row shows date, description, debit amount, credit amount, and balance
Add Transaction button opens a form to record new transactions
Running balance is clearly visible for each transaction

file_operations.description: Create TransactionList component that accepts customerId prop and fetches transactions using getTransactionsByCustomer backend method. Display transactions in a table with columns for date, description, debit, credit, and running balance. Sort transactions chronologically. Include Add Transaction button that opens transaction form. Use shadcn/ui Table component for layout.

Create CustomerLedger page that displays customer details and their transaction list. Accept customer ID from route params. Show customer name, email, phone at the top, followed by TransactionList component. Include back navigation to customer list.

requirements.summary: Implement customer form with validation for name, email, and phone
acceptanceCriteria: Customer form includes inputs for name, email, and phone number
Name field is required and validated
Email field is validated for proper email format
Phone field accepts valid phone number formats
Form shows error messages for invalid inputs
Form can be submitted to create or update customer records

file_operations.description: Create CustomerForm component with fields for name, email, and phone. Implement validation: name required, email format validation, phone number format validation. Use react-hook-form for form management and zod for schema validation. Display error messages for invalid inputs. Accept mode prop to support both create and edit operations. Use shadcn/ui Input, Button, and Form components. Call createCustomer or updateCustomer backend methods via useCustomers hook on submit.

Create CustomerDialog component that wraps CustomerForm in a shadcn/ui Dialog. Support both add and edit modes. Accept customer data prop for edit mode. Handle dialog open/close state and form submission.

requirements.summary: Implement transaction form with date, description, type, and amount fields
acceptanceCriteria: Transaction form includes date picker for transaction date
Description field accepts text input
Transaction type selector allows choosing between debit and credit
Amount field accepts numeric input with proper formatting
Form validates that amount is a positive number
Form can be submitted to create new transaction records

file_operations.description: Create TransactionForm component with fields for date (date picker), description (text input), transaction type (debit/credit selector), and amount (numeric input). Implement validation: amount must be positive number. Use react-hook-form and zod for validation. Calculate balance based on transaction type and previous balance. Call createTransaction backend method via useTransactions hook on submit. Use shadcn/ui Input, Select, Button, and Calendar/DatePicker components.
Create TransactionDialog component that wraps TransactionForm in a shadcn/ui Dialog. Accept customerId prop to associate transaction with customer. Handle dialog open/close state and form submission.

requirements.summary: Design professional UI theme with warm earth tones and clean typography
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses warm, professional tones throughout the application
Typography is clean and readable with appropriate hierarchy
Layout provides clear visual separation between customer list and transaction details
Design conveys professionalism appropriate for financial record-keeping
UI elements are consistently styled across all views

file_operations.description: Update CSS variables to implement warm earth tone color palette with terracotta, beige, and olive green as primary colors. Define professional typography hierarchy with clean, readable fonts. Set background colors and text colors that convey financial stability and trust. Ensure consistent spacing and layout patterns across the application.

Extend Tailwind config to include custom color palette with warm earth tones (terracotta, beige, olive green). Define custom font families for professional typography. Configure spacing and border radius values for clean, modern UI elements.

Create Layout component that provides consistent page structure with header containing application title and ledger icon, main content area, and navigation. Apply warm earth tone theme colors. Include navigation between customer list and individual ledger views. Use the generated ledger icon from frontend/public/assets/generated/ledger-icon.dim_128x128.png in the header.

requirements.summary: Render generated ledger icon as static asset in application
acceptanceCriteria: Generated ledger icon is placed in frontend/public/assets/generated
Icon is properly referenced in the application header or navigation
Images are served as static assets without backend routing

file_operations.description: Reference the generated ledger icon from frontend/public/assets/generated/ledger-icon.dim_128x128.png in the application header. Display the icon alongside the application title using an img tag with appropriate alt text and styling.
